price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߡߍ߲߫ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߊߟߊ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߛߊ߲߬ ߗߍ߬ߡߍ߫ ߛߓߊ߬ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߭ ߖߘߌ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߞߐ߬ߣߐ߲߬ߘߐ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَلَبِثُواْ فِي كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَٰثَ مِاْئَةٖ سِنِينَ وَٱزۡدَادُواْ تِسۡعٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walabithū fī kahfihim thalātha mi-atin sinīna wa-iz'dādū tis'ʿan
